card.name: Air Elemental
card.property: Flying

card.name: Blizzard Elemental
card.property: Flying {3}{U}: Untap Blizzard Elemental.

card.name: Brainstorm
card.property: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

card.name: Cloud Djinn
card.property: Flying Cloud Djinn can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Cloud Elemental
card.property: Flying Cloud Elemental can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Counterspell
card.property: Counter target spell.

card.name: Fog Elemental
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Fog Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.

card.name: Gaseous Form
card.property: Enchant creature Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

card.name: Giant Crab
card.property: {U}: Giant Crab gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Impulse
card.property: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Killer Whale
card.property: {U}: Killer Whale gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Leviathan
card.property: Trample Leviathan enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two Islands. If you do, untap Leviathan. Leviathan can't attack unless you sacrifice two Islands. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)

card.name: Mahamoti Djinn
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

card.name: Power Sink
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

card.name: Snapping Drake
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

card.name: Tolarian Winds
card.property: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.

card.name: Vigilant Drake
card.property: Flying {2}{U}: Untap Vigilant Drake.

card.name: Wayward Soul
card.property: Flying {U}: Put Wayward Soul on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Bone Harvest
card.property: Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Coercion
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Dark Ritual
card.property: Add {B}{B}{B}.

card.name: Death Stroke
card.property: Destroy target tapped creature.

card.name: Diabolic Edict
card.property: Target player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Drain Life
card.property: Spend only black mana on X. Drain Life deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.

card.name: Fallen Angel
card.property: Flying Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Feral Shadow
card.property: Flying

card.name: Gravedigger
card.property: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Hollow Dogs
card.property: Whenever Hollow Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Sengir Vampire
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

card.name: Skittering Horror
card.property: When you cast a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Horror.

card.name: Skittering Skirge
card.property: Flying When you cast a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Skirge.

card.name: Tar Pit Warrior
card.property: When Tar Pit Warrior becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

card.name: Terror
card.property: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Balduvian Horde
card.property: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

card.name: Ball Lightning
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

card.name: Bloodrock Cyclops
card.property: Bloodrock Cyclops attacks each combat if able.

card.name: Fireball
card.property: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

card.name: Hulking Cyclops
card.property: Hulking Cyclops can't block.

card.name: Kird Ape
card.property: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

card.name: Lava Axe
card.property: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Lightning Bolt
card.property: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Raging Goblin
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

card.name: Shivan Dragon
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Shock
card.property: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Sonic Burst
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card at random. Sonic Burst deals 4 damage to any target.

card.name: Talruum Minotaur
card.property: Haste

card.name: Thunderbolt
card.property: Choose one — • Thunderbolt deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. • Thunderbolt deals 4 damage to target creature with flying.

card.name: Thundering Giant
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

card.name: Crash of Rhinos
card.property: Trample

card.name: Crashing Boars
card.property: Whenever Crashing Boars attacks, defending player chooses an untapped creature they control. That creature blocks Crashing Boars this turn if able.

card.name: Deadly Insect
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Erhnam Djinn
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

card.name: Fog
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Force of Nature
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) At the beginning of your upkeep, Force of Nature deals 8 damage to you unless you pay {G}{G}{G}{G}.

card.name: Giant Growth
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Llanowar Elves
card.property: {T}: Add {G}.

card.name: Plated Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

card.name: Quirion Elves
card.property: As Quirion Elves enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

card.name: Rampant Growth
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Shambling Strider
card.property: {R} {G}: Shambling Strider gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Wild Growth
card.property: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.

card.name: Woolly Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Yavimaya Wurm
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

card.name: Diabolic Vision
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on top of your library in any order.

card.name: Segmented Wurm
card.property: Whenever Segmented Wurm becomes the target of a spell or ability, put a -1/-1 counter on it.

card.name: Clockwork Avian
card.property: Flying Clockwork Avian enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it. At end of combat, if Clockwork Avian attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian to be greater than four. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Clockwork Beast
card.property: Clockwork Beast enters the battlefield with seven +1/+0 counters on it. At end of combat, if Clockwork Beast attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast to be greater than seven. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.property: Dwarven Ruins enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}. {T}, Sacrifice Dwarven Ruins: Add {R}{R}.

card.property: Havenwood Battleground enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {T}, Sacrifice Havenwood Battleground: Add {G}{G}.
